rows.label: qst105610_msg001
rows.name:
本当にルクスリアは
アデルの正当な後継ではなかったんだな

rows.label: qst105610_msg0001
rows.name:
Master! Just who I wanted to see.
Glad you're still in one piece.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0002
rows.name: Here you go, Dad. I found the records.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0003
rows.name: So you did. Well done.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0004
rows.name:
Now, you wanted to hear the truth,
Liberbrant?

rows.label: qst105610_msg0005
rows.name:
Read this. You can read the ancient
language, can you not?

rows.label: qst105610_msg0006
rows.name: I can. Let me see...

rows.label: qst105610_msg0007
rows.name:
This... Why, this is... But this can't be...
It's absolutely...

rows.label: qst105610_msg0008
rows.name:
The Luxuria bloodline is not directly
descended from Adel...

rows.label: qst105610_msg0009
rows.name:
After usurping the throne during
a period of turmoil... Ohh...
My goodness...

rows.label: qst105610_msg0010
rows.name:
So now you see.
I intend to announce it publicly,
when the time is right.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0011
rows.name:
Were we not a pure...noble bloodline?
What was it all for...?

rows.label: qst105610_msg0012
rows.name:
Master Liberbrant... You've read
through it all?

rows.label: qst105610_msg0013
rows.name: From cover to cover, yes...

rows.label: qst105610_msg0014
rows.name:
All right. Why do you think our
ancestors claimed that we were
direct descendants of Adel?

rows.label: qst105610_msg0015
rows.name: Well...

rows.label: qst105610_msg0016
rows.name:
Adel defended the Iirans in order
to unite Luxuria as one people.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0017
rows.name:
We may not have inherited Adel's
blood...

rows.label: qst105610_msg0018
rows.name:
But let me tell you this: we sure as
hell inherited his spirit!

rows.label: qst105610_msg0019
rows.name:
Not his blood, but his spirit...
That I cannot deny, Your Highness.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0020
rows.name:
I fear I may have been getting my
priorities out of order.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0021
rows.name:
To think, the teacher would one day
become the student... You've come
a long way, my child.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0022
rows.name:
So you get it now? That's what I like
to hear!

rows.label: qst105610_msg0023
rows.name:
*chuckle* All's well that ends well,
then?

rows.label: qst105610_msg0024
rows.name: Hey, what are you laughing about?

rows.label: qst105610_msg0025
rows.name:
I'm just impressed. Impressed that my
Prince really shines when push comes
to shove...unlike all the other times.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0026
rows.name:
Wha...! Is that any way to compliment
someone?!

rows.label: qst105610_msg0027
rows.name: Ahem...

rows.label: qst105610_msg0028
rows.name:
You've helped us immeasurably
this day, Zeke.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0029
rows.name:
Sure, sure. Just remember where you
put your keys next time,okay, Dad?

rows.label: qst105610_msg0030
rows.name:
For that, I can but apologize. I will
endeavor to pay more attention.

rows.label: qst105610_msg0031
rows.name:
Well, it's getting on. Time we made
a move. I trust you've got things
sorted on your end?

rows.label: qst105610_msg0032
rows.name: That we do. Take care, Zeke...
